document_data.caption: The banner of Clan Flameshade in [[Grymforge]]
document_data.name: Clan Flameshade
document_data.mainbody: '''Clan Flameshade''' was a [[duergar]] clan of the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Clan Flameshade members were hired by [[Thrinn|Sergeant Thrinn]] to help the [[True Soul]] of [[the Absolute]] [[Nere]] enslave more people for the further excavations of [[Grymforge]].
document_data.Known Members:
* [[Brithvar]], the elder of Clan Flameshade
* [[Thrinn]], a duergar sergeant of the Absolute
* [[Morghal]], cleric of [[Laduguer]]
* [[Orgath]], [[Stone Guard]]
